items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty suggests a positive start; US, Asian markets gain
items.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates: Wall Street ended higher on Monday, with both the S&P 500 and the Dow posting fresh record finishes, as investors bought into technology stocks ahead of a busy week packed with corporate earnings and crucial economic data. The S&P 500 gained 44.82 points, or 0.77%, to 5,859.85 points, while the Nasdaq Composite climbed 159.75 points, or 0.87%, to 18,502.69. The Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 201.36 points, or 0.47%, to 43,065.22.

items.title: First Tick: Top 10 global cues for todayâ€™s trade

items.description: The Nifty 50 is likely to continue its upward rally given the beginning of momentum and a fall in volatility. Below are some trading ideas for the near term.

items.title: Stock Radar: Reliance, HCL Tech, Angel One, Sunteck Realty, Chalet Hotels, Garuda Construction, J Kumar in focus on Tuesday
items.description: Stocks like Gopal Snacks, Sterling and Wilson Renewable Energy, JSW Infrastructure, Zydus Lifesciences, CESC, Authum Investment and Infrastructure, Can Fin Homes, and CG Power and Industrial Solutions will be in focus on October 15.

items.title: Stock of the day| Rainbow Children's Medicare|  Hospital stock to nourish your investment portfolio
items.description: Founded in 1999 under the leadership of Dr Ramesh Kancharla, Rainbow is one of the large multi-specialty paediatric hospital chains in India in terms of bed capacity. It offers a range of services such as newborn and paediatric intensive care, paediatric multi-specialty services, paediatric quaternary care, obstetrics, and gynaecology

items.title: Angel One stock in focus on robust net profit, revenue growth in Q2
items.description: Angel One shares in spotlight as brokerage reports a 39 percent surge in Q2 FY25 net profit to Rs 423.4 crore, with revenue up 44.5 percent.

items.description: JSW Infrastructure Share Price | The royalty payable is based on per metric ton which will be escalated in the block period of 5 years.

items.description: J Kumar Infraprojects Share Price | The project is for development of Mula river from Wakad bypass to Sangvi bridge (stretch 1,2,3) and to be completed in 36 months.

items.title: HDFC Bank stock gets Jefferies' buy rating on strong deposit growth, LDR improvement plans
items.description: HDFC Bank shares are in focus as Jefferies issued a buy rating, highlighting the bank's strategy to improve its loan-to-deposit ratio through robust deposit growth and branch expansion.

items.title: Agri Picks Report October 15, 2024: Geojit Financial Services
items.description: According to Geojit, The India Meteorological Department Monday said that the Northeast Monsoon is likely to begin over southeastern peninsular India around Tuesday and Wednesday.

items.title: Live: Can RIL, HCLTech fuel more gains on the Nifty? Hyundai Motor India IPO opens| Opening Bell
items.description: Indian equity market gained strength after a three-day consolidation, climbing seven-tenths of a percent on October 14 with a further decline in volatility. On Monday, the Sensex was up 591.69 points or 0.73 percent at 81,973.05, and the Nifty was up 163.70 points or 0.66 percent at 25,128. On the back of positive global cues, the Indian markets opened higher and extended the gains as the day progressed with Nifty crossing 25150 led by in the Information Technology, realty and banking stocks. This morning global cues are positive with GIFT Nifty hinting at mildly higher start. Markets will digest numbers from RIL & HCL Tech. Indiaâ€™s largest IPO â€“ Hyundai Motor Indiaâ€™s public issue opens for subscription today. Catch Nandita Khemka in conversation with Nirav Chheda, Assistant Vice President - Equity Derivatives & Technical Research- Retail, Nirmal Bang and Kranthi Bathini, Equity strategist, WealthMills Securities.

items.title: JSW Infra shares rise 3% as Nuvama initiates with 'buy' on strong prospects
items.description: Nuvama says that JSW Infra as the second-largest private port operator in a steadily growing industry, stands to benefit from strong parentage

items.title: Sunteck Realty stock jumps 7% on robust Q2 business update, Rs 520 in pre-sales
items.description: Sunteck Realty shares rose over 7 percent, driven by a strong Q2FY25 performance with pre-sales increasing 33 percent YoY to Rs 520 crore, reflecting continued demand in the Mumbai Metropolitan Region.

items.title: Stocks On Radar| HCLTech, Reliance Industries Q2, Angel One, JSW Infrastructure in Focus
items.description:
HCLTech's Q2 net profit rose 11 percent on-year to Rs 4,235 crore, beating Street expectations. Reliance Industries consolidated YoY profit declines 2.8% to Rs 19,323 crore. 
Broking company Angel One has posted a strong set of numbers, with revenue coming in at Rs 1,514.7 crore during the September quarter. 
JSW Infrastructure received a Letter of Intent from the Maharashtra Maritime Board for development, operation, management and maintenance of an all-weather and multipurpose port at Palghar and much more

items.title: Gainers & Losers: Stocks and sectors that moved the most on October 15
items.description: The Sensex and Nifty closed in the red on October 15, dragged by weak performances from O&G and banking stocks. Here are some stocks that moved the most in trade today.

items.title: Live: Nifty Fails To Defend 25,200 As Opening Gains Fizzle Out| Angel One In Focus| Closing Bell
items.description:
Nifty gives up opening gains after reclaiming 25,200. Index holds 25,000 amid choppy trade. Midcaps trade flat; smallcaps outperform. NSE advance-decline ratio at 1:1; favours losers. Metals, autos & pharma among big drags. Realty, FMCG and banks among sectoral gainers. Join Nandita Khemka and Yatin Mota as they break down the key stocks on their radar.
#nse #bse #stockmarket #sharemarket
